typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 2,
		movie
	)) ~> moviesdbfile
moviesdbfile sink(input(
		{6100} as string,
		{Midsummer Night's Sex Comedy, A} as string,
		{Comedy|Romance} as string,
		{1982} as string,
		{5} as string,
		{78} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['test.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
